Premium Plus.subProductAliasCode: Premium Plus - RON, Premium Plus - AAT

Nextdoor.medium: Single Image, Carousel, Slideshow, or Video

RON.description: Will run on both Mobile and Desktop, best for reaching as many people as possible, low conversions

AAT.description: Audiences to Target (Ex: Adults 25-54, Households with children etc.)

WTG.description: Use provided website categories (Health, Business, Real Estate etc.)

GEO.description: Radius for each fence between 1 and 18 miles as a best practice but the minimum is 100 Meters....Lookback Window needs to be added to see devices in the fences in the past (1 month, 3 months, 6 months or 1 year)

HLM.description: Just another name for Geo-Fencing with foot traffic

CRM.description: Use clients CRM data for targeting and retargeting

RTG.description: Pixels are placed inside of a GTM made in a given platform to retarget users who clicks ads

geofencing: Addressable Solutions - Geofencing with Foot Traffic
